member.name: EXCEPINFO
member.summary: Describes an exception that occurred during IDispatch.Invoke.

member.name: EXCEPINFO.wCode
member.summary: The error code. Error codes should be greater than 1000. Either this field or the scode field must be filled in; the other must be set to 0.

member.name: EXCEPINFO.bstrSource
member.summary: The name of the exception source. Typically, this is an application name. This field should be filled in by the implementer of IDispatch.

member.name: EXCEPINFO.bstrDescription
member.summary: The exception description to display. If no description is available, use null.

member.name: EXCEPINFO.bstrHelpFile
member.summary: The fully qualified help file path. If no Help is available, use null.

member.name: EXCEPINFO.pfnDeferredFillIn
member.summary: Provides deferred fill-in. If deferred fill-in is not desired, this field should be set to null.

member.name: EXCEPINFO.scode
member.summary: A return value that describes the error. Either this field or wCode (but not both) must be filled in; the other must be set to 0. (16-bit Windows versions only.)
